title: Russian agency offers fake restaurant reviews ahead of World Cup
text:
Russian agency offers fake restaurant reviews ahead of World Cup 8:11am EDT - 01:20
A Russian marketing agency has offered to help restaurants in cities hosting the soccer World Cup use fake reviews to bump up ratings on review site TripAdvisor. Marketing company Bacon Agency says it can circumvent TripAdvisor's algorithm for detecting fraudulent posts and publish reviews in foreign languages ahead of an influx of fans from abroad. Jacob Greaves reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
